alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 3:22AM CDT until March 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 009, 021, AND 035... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 9 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 009, 021, and 035. * WIND...South winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * HUMIDITY...Falling to 15 to 27 percent in the afternoon. * THUNDERSTORMS...Thunderstorms are unlikely during the afternoon, though can`t be ruled out during the evening in the warning area. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
